Messages.Content:
GxPT stores conversations only on your device and sends requests over TLS. Chat content is governed by OpenRouter and each model provider's policies. By default, OpenRouter does not store prompts or responses unless you opt in, and you can restrict to providers with Zero Data Retention (ZDR).

- Privacy & logging: https://openrouter.ai/docs/features/privacy-and-logging
- ZDR: https://openrouter.ai/docs/features/zdr
- Privacy settings: https://openrouter.ai/settings/privacy
